text: Heinz Hermann Polzer (; 24 August 1919 â€“ 13 June 2015), better known under his pseudonym Drs. P (), was a Swiss singer-songwriter, poet, and prose writer in the Dutch language. "Zanger en plezierdichter Drs. P op 95-jarige leeftijd overleden", NRC Handelsblad; retrieved 14 June 2015. Other pseudonyms were Geo Staad, Coos Neetebeem (a variant of the name of Dutch writer Cees Nooteboom) and drandus P. Drs. P. died at the age of 95, in Amsterdam in the Netherlands. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch singers Category:Writers from Amsterdam Category:Swiss singer- songwriters Category:People from Thun
title: Drs. P
